text: I'm a chemist and chemists got really
excited when Macintosh computers started
and they were really good because you
could draw pictures of molecules but
chemists to begin with anyway were not
very good with computers and they often
crashed I had all sorts of problems when
I started with my first Mac so I was
given a present the computer's long gone
but I've still got the present and it's
in this box
it comes with a manual it's called a
Smacker MAAC and the manual is really
quite formal has a registration card a
warranty limited unw warranty on
replacement so let's look at the smacka
MAAC
itself it's a squashy toy that looks
like the original Mac computer and the
idea was that when you got frustrated
with the
computer instead of kicking the computer
or smashing it you would strangle the
smack AAC or throw it across the room go
on actually I never threw it across the

face but still and it's been sitting
there in its box smiling at me in my

Macintosh Professor I can't help
noticing you don't have a Macintosh now
yeah what's happened unfortunately I was
really like Macintosh computers but the
university decided that PCS were
better and so I was persuaded a

you change everybody else will so I was
persuaded really what persuaded me was
in those days that PC laptops were much

there are more people who can help me
with PCS when things go
wrong some people get very you know
excised by this don't they do you enter
the debate is that something you even
think about I never really worry very
much about computers I want one that
works that's easy to use and the problem
with mac and PCs are that they're both
easy to use but they're different you
have to click on one side of a window
when you want it to shut on a PC the
opposite side on a Mac and things like
that so you can't easily use both unless
you're young and the other problem is
that certainly I find find that they
compatibility issues between the
programs they work
99% but the 1% of the time an arrow will
suddenly swell up when you go from one
computer to the other or some symbol or
some strange character won't transfer
properly I have noticed though in in
recent times you've transitioned to the

was given an

like the iPhone but I haven't bought any

iPad but

if I want to do some serious piece of
